text: Richard Paul Bacon (born 30 November 1975) is an English television and radio presenter. ==Work== He had worked as a reporter or a cover presenter on a number of television programmes. These include The Big Breakfast and ITV's breakfast programme Good Morning Britain, as well as on radio stations such as Capital FM, Xfm London and BBC Radio Five Live. In 2016, Bacon co-hosted the National Geographic Channel documentary and panel discussion TV series Explorer. Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:English television presenters
title: Richard Bacon (broadcaster)
